testsuite.name: 9 - I should be able to change state of pipeline instance under Monitor tab

testcase.name: 9 - I should be able to change state of pipeline instance under Monitor tab AN-9-1 Should be able to pause a running instance
testcase.classname: AN-9-1 Should be able to pause a running instance

testcase.name: 9 - I should be able to change state of pipeline instance under Monitor tab AN-9-2 Should be able to kill a running instance

testcase.name: 9 - I should be able to change state of pipeline instance under Monitor tab AN-9-3 Should be able to resume a paused instance
testcase.classname: AN-9-3 Should be able to resume a paused instance

testcase.name: 9 - I should be able to change state of pipeline instance under Monitor tab AN-9-4 Should be able to restart a failed instance

testcase.name: 9 - I should be able to change state of pipeline instance under Monitor tab AN-9-5 Should be able to restart a killed instance
testcase.classname: AN-9-5 Should be able to restart a killed instance

failure.message: Timed out retrying: Expected to find content: 'Failed' within the element: <div.pipeline-table-row.done> and with the selector: '.status' but never did.
